title: 12/06: Start or Sit (NFC); DAL-CHI Recap (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We're off to a good Fantasy start as most of the startable players came through in DAL-CHI. We recap the game and give our thoughts on Mitchell Trubisky, Anthony Miller, a sorta struggling Dak Prescott and the rest from last night's game. Then we've got your news and notes (10:25) including a thorough discussion about Dalvin Cook ... Some key stats to know for the games we're previewing today (17:25). Why you should sit Kyler Murray, what Jimmy Garoppolo has been doing as a passer, Jacoby Brissett's potential game script and more. Also Beat the Waiver Wire (23:00)! ... SF-NO (25:10), LAC-JAC (34:10), BAL-BUF (43:05), NYG-PHI (49:05), DET-MIN (58:30), IND-TB (1:06:23), WAS-GB (1:11:30), CAR-ATL (1:14:00), ARI-PIT (1:19:25) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Recapping DAL-CHI and previewing the NFC homes plus a couple of the AFC home games on this marathon episode of FFT!
